channel.title: Iot-logs on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Iot-logs on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Why Go?
item.description: The reasons I like Go so much will be documented as we progress through this document. I won’t get into various reasons why Go is better or worse than another programming languages for the IoT Project. Under the direction of a competent developer this project could have been written successfully any modern “well known” language including but not limited to: C++, Rust, Python, Node/JS, Java and it’s machine code variants, and so on.
